Subskills.name: Secondary Haunting
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to fire an additional bullet.

Subskills.name: Spirits Within Rounds
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of projectiles released by the initial hit.

Subskills.name: Ghostwhirl
Subskills.description: Projectiles now swirl around the target on a small radius.

Subskills.name: Exorcism
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by possessed bullet.

Subskills.name: Hemorrhaging Possession
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Blood Ripples
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash blood ripples on hit dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Bloodlusted Bullet
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Malignance
Subskills.description: Send multiple homing ghosts towards the target dealing damage to monsters on their path.

Subskills.name: The Demon Within
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash additional bullets after initial hit.

Subskills.name: Leeching Demon
Subskills.description: Blood ripples replenish a portion of your maximum life on hit.

Subskills.name: Seeking Host
Subskills.description: Possessed bullets now return to the target after a short duration.

Subskills.name: Haunting
Subskills.description: Bullets now haunt monsters, slowing them and exploding after a short duration, dealing area of effect damage.
